subject: Shipment not moving past "Label Created. Date pending"
description_text:
My order that I placed on December 23rd has been said it is "shipped" but
inside of the tracking number it has not made an update since "Label
Created". I am curious if this is a bug in the system or what is happening
here.

My order number is SSN5214

Thanks in advance.
-- 
*Carter Jostock*
Cinematographer | Director of Photography
? Based in Minneapolis, Minnesota
? (651)-231-7179
✉️ carterjostock15@gmail.com
? Portfolio: Carter Jostock <https://www.instagram.com/carterjostock/>

conversations.body_text: Hi Carter Jostock,  I see that the tracking shows your order is already in transit.

It’s been updated, thank you!

*Carter Jostock*
Cinematographer | Director of Photography
? Based in Minneapolis, Minnesota
? (651)-231-7179
✉️ carterjostock15@gmail.com
? Portfolio: Carter Jostock <https://www.instagram.com/carterjostock/>


On Tue, Dec 30, 2025 at 8:38 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Carter Jostock,  You're welcome. Thank you for purchasing our product. Should you have any questions in the future, please feel free to contact us. We will address them promptly.
